name: Python 3
updateContentCommand:
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && \
    [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo xargs apt install -y < packages.txt; \
    python3 -m pip install --user pipenv; \
    pipenv --rm || true; \
    [ -f Pipfile ] && pipenv install --dev; \
    [ -f requirements.txt ] && pipenv install --dev --skip-lock; \
    echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'

postAttachCommand.server: pipenv run streamlit run WhatsApp-Chat-Analyzer-master/app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
